pr_title: xds: replace UpstreamTlsContext with internal definition

timeline.message: xds: replace UpstreamTlsContext with internal definition

timeline.author: creamsoup
creamsoup

replies.bodyText: In a later PR I will translate CommonTlsContext to its internal version in which case default instance will be mapped to null and will be nullable but currently it will be non-null. I will mark it nullable. Practically speaking it is an error/bug for the xDS server to include UpstreamTlsContext with a default instance (as explained before).
replies.author: sanjaypujare

replies.bodyText: okay, i left the comment because there are few places checking nullness of commonTlsContext.
replies.author: creamsoup
